location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 41 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports the arrival of Shaikh Nassir (with Shaikh Sagur of Al Haram & Shaikh Nasoor of Bareen and numerous vessels) to Bushire and states that he had obtained 1,000 men from the Cahn of Kerdistan [Kurdistan].
